content: Singapore Saving Bonds (SSB) STI ETF Property Investments Asked by Shawn LimAsked on 04 Feb 2019I'm currently putting in $100/mth into STI ETF and $1000 into SSB. I am looking at next is investing in REITS through a brokerage. Should I buy a lot or 1000 shares if I have around 1k-5k to invest?1 answerAnswerBump0

MasterUpdated on 19 Aug 20191 lot is 100 shares usually in Singapore context. 1 lot or 10 lot is up to you and have to see the share price of the REITs that you are interested in as well. Just make sure you done your research before buying and comfortable with stock volatility. 1 comment1
